name: play
description: Play audio tracks and playlists from urls

options.name: now
options.description: Add tracks to start of queue and play immediately

options.name: url
options.description: A media link or playlist to queue

options.name: shuffle
options.description: (default true) Should the linked media playlist be shuffled before queued

options.name: queue
options.description: Add tracks to the end of queue

options.name: url
options.description: A media link or playlist to queue

options.name: shuffle
options.description: (default true) Should the linked media playlist be shuffled before queued

options.name: next
options.description: Add tracks to next in queue

options.name: url
options.description: A media link or playlist to queue

options.name: shuffle
options.description: (default true) Should the linked media playlist be shuffled before queued
